channel.title: Adding Torva (Delta 317)
channel.description:
Yes, it's Delta don't hate.
I'm trying to add Torva to my server but I've got to the point where I can add the models but when I compile and restart it still doesn't work. Here's a list of things I've done. (Procedure)
Added models to model folder Added correct ints with good inventory model to class8.java Added correct Torva stats into Item.cfg in source Added the correct "wearing" to Item.java Compiled with no Errors Logged in added models recompiled both Logged in tried to pickup (I get Paintings) The item numbers are within 8,000-15,000 (Specifically 8001, 8002, 8003)
I've done much more to try to help myself out also, I didn't even bring it to forums without researching and trying to fix it for 4 hours. Please help I have been working a long time to add this. :)

item.title: Adding Torva (Delta 317)
item.dc:creator: @z_0_m_g_str z 0 m g str
item.description:
@z_0_m_g_str wrote:

Yes, it’s Delta don’t hate.

I’m trying to add Torva to my server but I’ve got to the point where I can add the models but when I compile and restart it still doesn’t work. Here’s a list of things I’ve done. (Procedure)

Added models to model folder
Added correct ints with good inventory model to class8.java
Added correct Torva stats into Item.cfg in source
Added the correct “wearing” to Item.java
Compiled with no Errors
Logged in added models recompiled both
Logged in tried to pickup (I get Paintings)
The item numbers are within 8,000-15,000 (Specifically 8001, 8002, 8003)

I’ve done much more to try to help myself out also, I didn’t even bring it to forums without researching and trying to fix it for 4 hours. Please help I have been working a long time to add this.
